SEARCH

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player class contains 3 different parameters inside of it Ammo is the amount of times a player can fire before needing to collect resupplies Health is the amount of times a player can take damage before game over Speed is governed by the Shiptype chosen by the player in the beginning
